content.rendered:
Bhutan Airlines Tashi Air Pvt. Ltd, trading as Bhutan Airlines, is Bhutan’s first private airline. The airline resumed services on 10 October 2013, beginning its first international flights to India and Thailand. km It was launched on 2011.

 

Bhutan Airlines Baggage

Queries handled by Bhutan Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

List of Bhutan Airlines Offices:

 Bhutan- Thimphu
 Bhutan- Paro Town, Paro
 Bhutan- Paro
 Thailand- Bangkok
 India- Kolkata 
 India- New Delhi

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Bhutan Airlines Offices Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Bhutan Airlines Offices: (click on the stars below)
